version_description:
1、新增广场功能，可以浏览用户发布的动态
2、修复已知问题

1、因新的品牌规划，挑音更名为耳觅
2、界面风格优化
3、新增关注操作，可以查看关注的人的动态
4、修复已知问题

1、丰富动态内容，增加动态话题标签
2、优化现有问题

1. Rename moments to records
2. Update the posting form and enrich the contents of records
3. Update the posting form and enrich the contents of Lingchang

1. A new version of timbre test
2. The lead singer adds a new page to show the lead singer of the person concerned
3. Optimizing existing problems

1.Added global lead vocals and global records.
2.Private letter added invitation to continue singing .
3.Private letter added intimacy function.
4.Repair known problems.

1. Repair the problem that the content of recommendation system can not be refreshed.
2. Fix system crashes.

1、Optimized the ranking lists of singers and songs in Lingchang
2、Added the Lingchang album function in the personal homepage

1. The record is renamed video.
2. Update video release form and enrich video content.
3. Optimize and upgrade the comment area.
4. Improve the reporting process.

1. The new learning and singing function of lead singer/chorus singer;
2. Customer service adds intelligent response function;

Learning Singing Function: You can sing when you listen to it. From then on, you will become Maba.
Video Function: Fix Load Slow Problem

Add the function of "playing and singing": changing seconds to achieve the goal of playing and singing
Add "Footprint" Switch: Footprint Stealth can be set

Add the function of "playing and singing": changing seconds to achieve the goal of playing and singing
Add "Footprint" Switch: Footprint Stealth can be set
Fix bugs in music upload
Fix Video Publishing bugs

1. [Playing and Singing] New Up-and-Down Function
2. [Lead singer] Added 30 seconds of recordings by certified singers
3. [Publish Video] Added Sticker Function and Horizontal and Vertical Screen Switching Function

1. [Playing and Singing] New Up-and-Down Function
2. [Lead singer] Added 30 seconds of recordings by certified singers
3. [Publish Video] Added Sticker Function and Horizontal and Vertical Screen Switching Function

1. All users have the authority to release the 30s cover version, which delights the singing experiences
2. Users are able to set the private permission of their songs and reduce the pressure of their songs being heard by strangers
3. A new instrument-electrical piano is added
4. Daily singing board is added with more enjoyable voices

1. [New] Wave Sound Effect
2. [Optimizing] the Sound Quality of Musical Instruments
3. [Optimizing] Part of Interactive Experience
4. [Fix] Some bugs
Fix Known Problems and Improve Experience

1. Add the "Circle" function, find the "music" circle you are interested in, and harvest more wonderful content.
2. Upgrade the "Focus" Tab and check the content of your friends'lead singing, videos, posts, and cover songs at any time.

1. [New] More instruments, environmental sounds, more rich playing and singing
2. [Optimizing] Optimizing the Timbre Testing Function~
3. [Optimize] Fix bugs and optimize experience

1. [Optimizing] Optimizing the Timbre Testing Function~
2. [Optimize] Fix bugs and optimize experience

1. The rap function is completely new online, open your freestyle, hey burst the whole show!!!
2. Home page layout adjustment, left and right hand gestures scribe screen more convenient
3. Fix some known bugs

1、Add broadcasting function
2、Add new musical instrument - ukelele
1. Fix bugs and optimize user experience
1. Optimize the radio user experience

[new] Yes! To unlock your own medal of achievement ~
[new] more new and fun tests
[new] more musical instruments, environment sound, more singing and playing
[optimization] fix bugs, hope to bring you a better experience
Fix bugs, optimize experience~

[new] mood description - match wonderful songs with interesting souls
[new] invite singing - a new way to play song, super interesting interaction
[new] stereo - listen more
[optimization] issue failure, playback disconnection, headset and other related issues optimization

1. Optimize sound quality and improve sound effect
2. Release leader new: only visible settings
3. Fix flash back bug

1. New membership functions and rich privileges.   
2. New "Idol Rank" to make a hit-list for people you favor the most.   
3. New ways to play within private chats.            
4. New gift giving function for feeds. If you like it, you need to send it out.

1. Optimize the use experience of leading singing, chorus and other functions
2. Fix known bugs

[youth mode] under the "youth mode", we have selected a batch of high-quality content suitable for minors to watch, and we are unable to conduct interactive operations such as top-up reward, purchase exchange, bullet screen comment, live broadcast, etc. It will not be used from 22:00 to 6:00 every day. The accumulated use time of a single day is more than 40 minutes. You need to enter the monitoring password to continue using.
1. Add some new songs. Come and order a song for him / her in your heart
2. New private message chat interface, new expression store, more expressions ~
